rukus.text: 23|33|aur usakee jaati ke pramukhon ne kaha, jo kaafir ho gaye tatha aakhirat (paralok) ka saamana karane ko jhuthala diya tatha hamane unhen sampann kiya tha, saansaarik jeevan mein: ye to bas ek manushy hai tumhaare jaisa, khaata hai, jo tum khaate ho aur peeta hai, jo tum peete ho.
23|34|aur yadi tumane maan liya apane jaise ek manuj ko, to nishchay tum kshatigrast ho.
23|35|kya vah tumhen vachan deta hai ki jab tum mar jaoge aur dhool tatha haddiyaan ho jaoge, to tum, phir jeevit nikaale jaoge
23|36|bahut door kee baat hai, jisaka tumhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
23|37|jeevan to bas saansaarik jeevan hai, ham marate-jeete hain aur ham phir jeevit nahin kiye jaayenge.
23|38|ye to bas ek vyakti hai, jisane allaah par ek jhooth ghad liya hai aur ham usaka vishvaas karane vaale nahin hain.
23|39|nabee ne praarthana keeh mere paalanahaar! meree sahaayata kar, unake jhuthalaane par mujhe.
23|40|(allaah ne) kahaah sheeghr hee ve (apane kiye par) pachhataayenge.
23|41|antatah pakad liya unhen kolaahal ne satyaanusaar aur hamane unhen kachara bana diya, to dooree ho atyaachaariyon ke lie.
23|42|phir hamane paida kiya unake pashchaat doosare yug ke logon ko.
23|43|nahin aage hotee hai, koee jaati apane samay se aur na peechhe[1].

23|44|phir, hamane bheja apane rasoolon ko nirantar, jab-jabakisee samudaay ke paas usaka rasool aaya, unhonne use jhuthala diya, to hamane peechhe laga[1] diya unake, ek ko doosare ke aur unhen kahaanee bana diya. to dooree hai unake lie, jo eemaan nahin laate.
23|45|phir hamane bheja moosa tatha usake bhaee haaroon ko apanee nishaaniyon tatha khule tark ke saath.
23|46|firaun aur usake pramukhon kee or, to unhonne garv kiya tatha ve the hee abhimaanee log.
23|47|unhonne kahaah kya ham eemaan laayen apane jaise do vyaktiyon par, jabaki un donon kee jaati hamaare adheen hai
23|48|to unhonne donon ko jhuthala diy, tatha ho gaye vinaashon mein.
23|49|aur hamane pradaan kee moosa ko pustak[1], taaki ve maargadarshan pa jaayen.
23|50|aur hamane bana diya maryam ke putr tatha usakee maan ko ek nishaanee tatha donon ko sharan dee ek uchch basane yogy tatha pravaahit srot ke sthaan kee or[1].
